<title level="1" pfs="">[Ji-yook (Level 13)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1484)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 41

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Ji-yook (Level 13)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1484)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Kitsune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=341" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 26</row>

**Perception** +26; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Kitsune](/Languages.aspx?ID=86), [Nagaji](/Languages.aspx?ID=87), [Tengu](/Languages.aspx?ID=47), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +26, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +25, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +24, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +24

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +5

**Con** +3

**Int** +4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [darts](/Weapons.aspx?ID=68)_ (5), _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [handwraps of mighty blows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441)_, _+1 [explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2)_, [greater smokesticks](/Equipment.aspx?ID=135) (2)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 35 

**Fort** +20 

**Ref** +26 

**Will** +20 

</row>

**HP** 190

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_claw_ +26 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 3d4+11 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dart_ +26 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 2d4+6 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foxfire +24 ([range 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 3d4 electricity

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 33
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61)
- **1st**
[Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266)
- **5th**
[Illusory Scene](/Spells.aspx?ID=161)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) Ji-yook transforms into her [human](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6) form. Using Change Shape counts as creating a disguise for the [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46) use of [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5). Ji-yook can remain in her human form indefinitely, and she can shift back to her kitsune form by using this action again.

**Foxfire Blast** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)) Ji-yook makes a fist Strike. On a hit the target takes an additional 3d4 electricity damage and is [pushed back](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) 10 feet. On a critical hit, the target is pushed back and then knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

**Pinning Shot** <actions string="Single Action" />  Ji-yook expertly aims and flings a dart to peg an opponent to a nearby wall or floor. Ji-yook makes a dart Strike. If the attack hits, it deals no damage and instead pins the target to an adjacent surface. The target is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) and must spend an Interact action to attempt a DC 10 [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to pull the dart free; it can't move from its space until it succeeds. If Ji-yook's dart Strike was a critical hit, the target must succeed at two separate Athletics checks to pull the dart free. The target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) while it remains immobilized in this way.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Ji-yook Strikes deal an additional 3d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Ji-yook (Level 13)
